mapper.insert: insert into aps_receive_notice(f_bill_no, f_material_id, f_must_qty, f_check_qty, f_receive_qty, f_csn_receive_base_qty, f_in_stock_qty, version) select f_bill_no, f_material_id, f_must_qty, f_check_qty, f_receive_qty, f_csn_receive_base_qty, f_in_stock_qty, version + 1 from aps_receive_notice where version = (select max(version) from aps_receive_notice)
